com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.server

Class ServerGroupNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.AGroupNetwork
      • com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.server.ServerGroupNetwork

  • public class ServerGroupNetwork
extends AGroupNetwork
    AGroupNetwork implementation, which creates new group network, where user becomes "server."

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.AGroupNetwork

        groupThread

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerGroupNetwork(java.lang.String userName)
      Prepares new GroupServerThread with no required password and default values loaded from configuration file.
      ServerGroupNetwork(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String groupPassword)
      Prepares new GroupServerThread with given password and default values loaded from configuration file.
      ServerGroupNetwork(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String groupPassword, java.lang.String hostAddress, int port)
      Prepares new GroupServerThread on interface of given hostAddress with given password and default group address loaded from configuration file.
      ServerGroupNetwork(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String groupPassword, java.lang.String hostAddress, java.lang.String groupAddress, int port)
      Prepares new GroupServerThread bound on interface of given hostAddress with given password and default group address loaded from configuration file.
      ServerGroupNetwork(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String groupPassword, java.lang.String hostAddress, java.lang.String groupAddress, int port, int userInfoPeriod, int deadTime)
      Prepares new GroupServerThread bound on interface of given hostAddress with given password and group address.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerGroupNetwork

        public ServerGroupNetwork(java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.String groupPassword,
                          java.lang.String hostAddress,
                          java.lang.String groupAddress,
                          int port,
                          int userInfoPeriod,
                          int deadTime)
                   throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                          UDPLibException
        Prepares new GroupServerThread bound on interface of given hostAddress with given password and group address.
        Parameters:
        userName - User's name in network
        groupPassword - Password required to access this group or null, if none
        hostAddress - Address in network interface, which should server socket use
        groupAddress - Address of used multi cast group
        port - Port of server socket
        userInfoPeriod - Time between server sends info about group users and requests response from other users (ms)
        deadTime - Time, which will server wait after sending request, before it announces user as dead (ms)
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
        UDPLibException

      • ServerGroupNetwork

        public ServerGroupNetwork(java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.String groupPassword,
                          java.lang.String hostAddress,
                          java.lang.String groupAddress,
                          int port)
                   throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Prepares new GroupServerThread bound on interface of given hostAddress with given password and default group address loaded from configuration file.
        Parameters:
        userName - User's name in network
        groupPassword - Password required to access this group or null, if none
        hostAddress - Address in network interface, which should server socket use
        groupAddress - Address of used multi cast group
        port - Port of server socket
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException

      • shareFile

        public void shareFile(java.io.File file,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      IServerShareListener listener)
        Sends content of file into group, to share it with other client.
        Parameters:
        file - content to share
        name - unique id
        listener - object to notify about progress
